briefdescription.para: returns format of the audio stream
tells the audio stream to read n audio frames into the specified buffer

parameterdescription.para: Target data buffer to the method will write the read frames into. The specified buffer will be getFormat().getFrameSize()*frameCount big.
amount of frames to be read.

simplesect.para: Returns amount of frames really read. Should be frameCountToRead in most cases.

briefdescription.para: sets the position of the audio stream.

detaileddescription.para: For example to let the stream be read from the beginning of the file again, setPosition(0) would be called. This is usually done be the sound engine to loop a stream after if has reached the end. Return true if sucessful and 0 if not.

briefdescription.para: Reads and decodes audio data into an usable audio stream for the ISoundEngine.

detaileddescription.para: To extend irrKlang with new audio format decoders, the only thing needed to do is implementing the IAudioStream interface. All the code available in this class is only for mp3 decoding and may make this class look a bit more complicated then it actually is.
